Object.Name: eSIM IoT
Object.Description1: The interface between eIM and IPA as described in GSMA SGP.32.

Item.Name: State
Item.Description:
Status 0 – ready to receive eIM message 1 – not able to receive eIM message
Note: In case value is >0 then writing to resource 2 shall not be possible

Item.Name: EID
Item.Description: EID of the eUICC that is target of the object

Item.Name: eIM message
Item.Description: The message from eIM to IPA. The message shall be in the ASN.1 DER format defined in SGP.32 Section 6.3.1

Item.Name: IPA message
Item.Description: The message from IPA to eIM. The message shall be in the ASN.1 DER format defined in GSMA SGP.32 section 6.3.1

Item.Name: Clear IPA message
Item.Description: In case Send or Confirmable Notifications is not used to deliver IPA messsage then execution of this resource will confirm delivery of the IPA message and clear the resource 3.
